genresAdvancedInfo.name: drama
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Drama music is a genre that is characterized by its emotional and intense melodies. It often features orchestral arrangements and is used in films, television shows, and theater productions to convey a sense of drama and tension. Drama music can range from hauntingly beautiful to epic and bombastic, and is enjoyed by music lovers who appreciate its power to evoke strong emotions.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
